data.title: LP Insurance
data.meta_description: LP Insurance Services is an established and growing insurance and risk management services company changing the way people think about insurance.
data.text:
The LP Insurance Construction Practice Group consists of dozens of experienced professionals with industry-leading knowledge specific to the construction industry to ensure you are getting the right guidance for your businessâ€™s unique needs.

The Real Estate Practice Leaders at LP Insurance are here to help design the best course of action for you, your property, your company, and your team. Property owners, managers, and developers encounter many risks that can impact business, but you can get ahead of it with the help of LP.

The LP Insurance Medical Practice Team is focused on finding innovative and effective ways to help you manage your medical practice risks and help you protect all aspects of your practice and better serve your employees.

The Public Entities Practice Leaders at LP Insurance excel in managing public employer insurance programs and collaborating with both diverse bargaining groups and insurance committees. Whether short-term fixes or long-term strategies, we strive to help those in this unique sector.

The LP Insurance Hospitality & Gaming Practice Team is committed to creating personalized insurance and risk management plans as well as a service platform, we know how to meet the individual needs of every business.
